code: export var loadImage=function loadImage(path){return new Promise(function(resolve){var img=document.createElement('img');img.src=path;img.addEventListener('load',function(){resolve(img);});});};export var getImageData=function getImageData(path){return new Promise(function(resolve){window.fetch(path).then(function(response){return response.blob();}).then(function(blob){var reader=new FileReader();reader.addEventListener('load',function(){resolve(reader.result);},false);reader.readAsDataURL(blob);});});};export var scrollTo=function scrollTo(element){var offset=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;var top=window.innerHeight+element.offsetTop;window.scrollTo({top:top+offset,behavior:'smooth'});};
